name: Logging in
description: Navigate to the Exeter CLES Qualtrics login site
Use my login details until you add yourself

name: Project List
description: Signing in you get navigated to the list of projects. Click on 'BA Grant Project'

name: Project Page
description: This is the page when you can edit the screener
'Survey Flow' details the order in which participants view the pages of the site including the set up of exclusions
For more information visit the qualtrics support pages

name: Actions
description: This is the page where the automated emails are set up and monitored
For more information visit the qualtrics support pages

name: Data & Analysis
description: This is the page when you can view and download the data
To change the columns you can preview, click on 'Tools' and then 'Choose Columns
For instructions on how to do download the data, view separate tutorial
For more information visit the qualtrics support pages

name: Logging Out
description: To logout, click on the icon top right and press 'Logout'
